title: Textile, ca. 1890
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
Mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave
description: Panel of thin glazed chinz, roller printed. ground in grey, with naturalisstic flower clusters in lavender, rose and blue-green. Background has a streaked or cracked ice effect. Right side scalloped
